post.subject: Zenless Zone Zero's inaugural fan content event, "Drip Fest" is now live!
post.content: The inaugural Zenless Zone Zero Fan Work Contest, "Drip Fest," is now open for submissions. Head to the official event website during the event, copy the contest hashtags and share your original work on social media with them for the chance to win Polychromes, cash, and other merchandise. Winners from each category also stand a chance to win limited edition trophies! Go to the official website now for more event details. Unleash your drip, define your art! Use your original artwork to build New Eridu together with Proxies from around the globe:

post.subject: 🎁"Stock Up" Web Event Rewards Can Now Be Claimed
post.content: Dear Proxies: Welcome to New Eridu! In-game rewards for Zenless Zone Zero's "Stock Up" web event can now be claimed~ Participate now: https://hoyo.link/a0yiFOAL Proxies who have already participated in the event can follow the link to go to the event page. Select "Claim Rewards" on the "Inventory" screen, then after selecting the server and corresponding account you would like your rewards to be sent to, the rewards that were put in your inventory can be claimed. Rewards will be delivered via in-game mail within 24 hours after they have been claimed. The event is still ongoing. Proxies can participate to obtain at most A-Rank W-Engine: Slice of Time, Boopon ×3, A-Rank Drive Discs, and more in-game rewards. ※ The event will end on 2024/07/18 at 23:59:59 (UTC+8). Please go to the event page and claim your rewards promptly. ※ Rewards are valid for 180 days after the reward mail has been sent. Please claim your rewards promptly.

post.subject: Zenless Zone Zero's Inaugural Fan Content Event, "Drip Fest" Starts Soon!
post.content: "Dear Proxies, we have great news!" The 2024 Zenless Zone Zero global Fan Works Contest "Drip Fest" will begin on July 6! It doesn't matter if you are a veteran or a newcomer, all are welcome at Drip Fest! Here, you can create to your heart's content! Unleash your drip, define your art! Join creators from around the world and build New Eridu together! Stay tuned for more details! Honorary Event Ambassador: Starlight Knight Billy ❤
